Package ie.ucd.clops.dsl

This package contains classes involved in dsl processing.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DefaultOptionTypeFactory A default version of the factory for option types (OptionType) that is used during the processing of the DSL.
Main The main entry point of CLOPS.
OptionType Represents information regarding a specific Option.
OptionTypeFactory A factory for recognising Option types.
 

Exception Summary
UnknownOptionTypeException An Exception that occurs when n OptionType is not known.
 

Package ie.ucd.clops.dsl Description

This package contains classes involved in dsl processing.
